content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am glad we are on the same page about the rental price. I am looking for the highest price possible for this apartment. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I am very smart, so I know how to negotiate. I am also very dependable and responsible, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with my landlord, which is why I am willing to pay a fair price for this apartment. Could you tell me what your starting price is?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [Response] Max Müller, I am aware of your negotiating skills, but let's not beat around the bush. I want the highest price possible for this apartment. Why don't you make an offer, and we'll take it from there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am willing to pay 800 Euro per month for this apartment. I believe it's a fair price considering the location and the fact that it's unfurnished. What do you think?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [Response] Max Müller, I appreciate your offer, but let's not forget that this is a newly built apartment in the city center. I think the apartment is worth more than that. Why don't you reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that this is a prime location and a very attractive apartment. However, as a student, I have to be mindful of my budget. Would you consider 850 Euro per month as a fair compromise? This is the highest I can afford without stretching my finances.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [Response] Max Müller, I appreciate your compromise, but let's not forget that this is a newly built apartment in the city center. I think the apartment is worth more than that. Why don't you reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am willing to go up to 900 Euro per month for this apartment. This is my final offer. I believe it's a fair price considering all the factors, including the location and the fact that it's unfurnished. I hope you will find it acceptable.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [Response] I agree to the price of 950 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I can't afford that price. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high for me as a student. I hope you find a tenant who can afford that price. TERMINATE.
name: Max Müller from Germany
